tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (ADVP (RB truly)) (VP (VBP think) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (NN patience)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (DT a) (NN virtue)))))) (. .)))

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (ADJP (JJ Happy)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBD found) (NP (NN happiness)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN life)))))) (. .)))
